password.description: password to be used to login to ZEDCloud. One of token OR username/password must be specified.

token.description: API token to be used to login to ZEDCloud. One of token OR username/password must be specified.

username.description: Username to be used to login to ZEDCloud. One of token OR username/password must be specified.

cpus.description: Number of CPUs to be assigned to an App Instance of this app

drives.description: Number of drives required for an App Instance of this App

id.description: System defined unique Id of the Object

manifest_file.description: Location of Edge Application Manifest file (JSON format)

memory.description: Memory to be assigned to an App Instance of this App

name.description: User defined name of the object. Must be unique across the enterprise. Once object is created, name can’t be changed

networks.description: Number of Networks required by the App

revision.description: System defined revision information of the object

storage.description: Amount of Storage required for App Instance of this App

title.description: User defined title of the object. title can be changed any time.

user_defined_version.description: User defined version of the edge-app

activate.description: Mandatory Parameter. Used to activate (set to true) / deactivate ( set to false ) an Edge Application Instance

app_id.description: ID of the Edge APP to be used.

app_policy_id.description: ID of the associated App Policy Object

app_type.description: Type of Edge App - VM / Container etc. The following are valid values: APP_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED, APP_TYPE_VM, APP_TYPE_VM_RUNTIME, APP_TYPE_CONTAINER, APP_TYPE_MODULE

bundleversion.description: Version of Edge App the instance is referring to

collect_stats_ip_addr.description: IP Address of the Stats Collector module.

crypto_key.description: SENSITIVE. Crypto Key for decrypting user secret information. This field will not be published by terraform import command.

deployment_type.description: Type of deployment for the app, eg: azure, k3s, standalone. This comes from the App Manifest.

device_id.description: Edge Node id where the App Instance is deployed.

encrypted_secrets.description: SENSITIVE. Map of encrypted secretsThis field will not be published by terraform import command.

id.description: System defined unique Id of the Object

is_secret_updated.description: This field tells whether user secrets has updated or not, especially the custom config

name.description: User defined name of the object. Must be unique across the enterprise. Once object is created, name can’t be changed

project_id.description: ID of the project to which the Object belongs

remote_console.description: Enable ( true ) / Disable (false ) Remote Console for the Edge App Instance

revision.description: System defined revision information of the object

tags.description: Tags are name/value pairs that enable you to categorize resources. Tag names are case insensitive with max_length 512 and min_length 3. Tag values are case sensitive with max_length 256 and min_length 3

title.description: User defined title of the object. title can be changed any time.

user_defined_version.description: Edge app UserDefinedVersion this instance is running with

name.description: User Defined name of Custom Config
Name of Variable group

required.description: Indicates if this is a required condition

name.description: Name of variable group condition

default.description: Default value for the Variable Group Variable

encode.description: Encoding Type. Valid Values: FILE_ENCODING_UNSPECIFIED, FILE_ENCODING_BASE64

format.description: Format of the Variable. Valid Values: VARIABLE_FORMAT_UNSPECIFIED, VARIABLE_FORMAT_TEXT, VARIABLE_FORMAT_NUMBER, VARIABLE_FORMAT_FILE, VARIABLE_FORMAT_DROPDOWN, VARIABLE_FORMAT_BOOLEAN, VARIABLE_FORMAT_PASSWORD

name.description: Name of Variable Group Variable

required.description: Flag indicates if this is a required variable

block.description: Application initialization script template in cloud-config format and user specified values

cleartext.description: If set, don't encrypt the drive. Store in cleartext

drvtype.description: Type of Drive. Valid Values: UNSPECIFIED, CDROM, HDD, NET, HDD_EMPTY. HDD_EMPTY is to allocate the empty disk of maxsizebytes specified

ignorepurge.description: Don't purge this drive as part of purge command for mutable volumes

imagename.description: Name of Image Object used for the drive.

imvolname.description: Immutable Volume for this drive. Only one of imvolname and mvolname must be specified.

mountpath.description: Mount Path for the drive in the App Instance

mvolname.description: Mutable Volume for this drive. Only one of imvolname and mvolname must be specified.

preserve.description: Preserve the drive even when all app instances using it are deleted

readonly.description: ReadOnly Flag. If set, drive is mounted as readonly by app instance.

volumelabel.description: User defined volume to use for this drive

access_vlan_id.description: Access port vlan id. app interface with access vlan id zero will be treated as trunk port. valid vlan id range: 2 - 4093

acl.description: App Access Control Lists on the Interface

default_net_instance.description: Use the project default Network Instance for this interface.

directattach.description: Comes from manifest during app create. If true, Assign the interface to the App Instance.

intfname.description: Name of the Interface as specified in the Edge App

ipaddr.description: Static IP Address (/32) to be assigned to the Interface. Applicable only if network instance is configured as static DHCP

macaddr.description: In case of p2v we might want to provide a mac-address. Applicable only in case of DHCP=passthrough

netinstname.description: Network Instance name attached to the interface. Applicable only when "directattach" flag is false

name.description: Physical Adapter name

tags.description: Tags are name/value pairs that enable you to categorize resources. Tag names are case insensitive with max_length 512 and min_length 3. Tag values are case sensitive with max_length 256 and min_length 3

type.description: IoType specifies the type of the Input output of the Edge Node / App Instance. Valid Values: IO_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED, IO_TYPE_ETH, IO_TYPE_USB, IO_TYPE_COM, IO_TYPE_AUDIO, IO_TYPE_WLAN, IO_TYPE_WWAN, IO_TYPE_HDMI, IO_TYPE_LTE, IO_TYPE_OTHER

block.description: Physical Adapter to be matched for interface assignment. Applicable only when "directattach" flag is true
Interface Configuration for the App Instance

access.description: Flag to enable (true) / disable (false) sending of logs generated by app instance to ZEDCloud.

cluster_id.description: ID of the Cluster to which the Edge Node belongs.

eve_image_version.description: Verion of EVE-OS image to be used by the Edge Node

id.description: System defined unique Id of the Object

model_id.description: ID of device model object for the Edge Node

name.description: User defined name of the object. Must be unique across the enterprise. Once object is created, name can’t be changed

project_id.description: ID of the project to which the Object belongs

revision.description: System defined revision information of the object

tags.description: Tags are name/value pairs that enable you to categorize resources. Tag names are case insensitive with max_length 512 and min_length 3. Tag values are case sensitive with max_length 256 and min_length 3

title.description: User defined title of the object. title can be changed any time.

country.description: Country code consisting of 2 capital letters as per ISO 3166-1 alpha2 standard

loc.description: Ordered pair of (latitude, longitude) separated by comma (,). Latitude is the horizontal component used for geographic positioning. It is the angle between 0° (the equator) and ±90° (north or south) at the poles measured in decimal degrees. It is the first value in an ordered pair. A negative number denotes a location south of the equator. a positive number is north. Longitude is the vertical component used for  geographic positioning; it is the angle between 0° (the Prime Meridian) and ±180° (westward or eastward) measured in decimal degrees. It is the second number in an ordered pair. A negative number indicates a location west of Greenwich, England; a positive number east.

org.description: The name of the recipient, firm, or company at this geographical location.

postal.description: Postal code (ZIP code for USA) of the geographical location

underlay_ip.description: Single IP address, either in IPv4 or in IPv6 format

cost.description: Cost of using this interface. Default is 0. Maximum: 255

intf_usage.description: Adapter Usage. Valid values are: ADAPTER_USAGE_UNSPECIFIED, ADAPTER_USAGE_MANAGEMENT, ADAPTER_USAGE_APP_DIRECT, ADAPTER_USAGE_APP_SHARED, ADAPTER_USAGE_DISABLED

intfname.description: Name of interface in the manifest to which this network or adapter maps to

ipaddr.description: IP address. Required if network is configured for static address

macaddr.description: Mac address to be used for the interface. Could be over-written in some cases

netname.description: Name of network object attached to the interface

tags.description: Tags are name/value pairs that enable you to categorize resources. Tag names are case insensitive with max_length 512 and min_length 3. Tag values are case sensitive with max_length 256 and min_length 3

datastore_id.description: Datastore Id where image binary is located

id.description: System defined unique Id of the Object

image_arch.description: Image Architecture. Valid Values: AMD64, ARM64

image_format.description: Image binary format. Valid Values: FmtUnknown, RAW, QCOW, QCOW2, VHD, VMDK, OVA, VHDX, CONTAINER

image_version.description: System defined Version of the Object

name.description: User defined name of the object. Must be unique across the enterprise. Once object is created, name can’t be changed

origin_type.description: Origin type of image, Valid Values: ORIGIN_UNSPECIFIED, ORIGIN_IMPORTED, ORIGIN_LOCAL, ORIGIN_GLOBAL

revision.description: System defined revision information of the object

title.description: User defined title of the object. title can be changed any time.

enterprise_default.description: Flag to make this network default for device

id.description: System defined unique Id of the Object

kind.description: Kind of network. Valid Values: NETWORK_KIND_V4, NETWORK_KIND_V6

name.description: User defined name of the object. Must be unique across the enterprise. Once object is created, name can’t be changed

project_id.description: ID of the project to which the Object belongs

revision.description: System defined revision information of the object

title.description: User defined title of the object. title can be changed any time.

addrs.description: List of IP addresses for the specified hostname

dhcp.description: DHCP Type (Static / Client etc.). Valid Values: NETWORK_DHCP_TYPE_STATIC, NETWORK_DHCP_TYPE_PASSTHROUGH, NETWORK_DHCP_TYPE_CLIENT

dns.description: List of IP Addresses of DNS servers

block.description: Range of IP addresses to be used for DHCP

network_proxy.description: Enable WPAD (Web Proxy Auto Discovery) Protocol to discover and download PAC file.

network_proxy_url.description: URL for wpad.dat file to be downloaded. Used when network_proxy is set to False.

pacfile.description: Proxy configuration in a pacfile. Used when network_proxy is set to False.

proto.description: Net Proxy proto. Valid Values: NETWORK_PROXY_PROTO_HTTP, NETWORK_PROXY_PROTO_HTTPS, NETWORK_PROXY_PROTO_SOCKS, NETWORK_PROXY_PROTO_FTP, NETWORK_PROXY_PROTO_OTHER

block.description: Net Proxy: protocol level proxies. Used when network_proxy is set to False.

type.description: Type of Wireless Network. Valid values: NETWORK_WIRELESS_TYPE_WIFI, NETWORK_WIRELESS_TYPE_CELLULAR

identity.description: SENSITIVE. WPA2 Enterprise user identity/username. Use Value from Vault. This field will not be published by terraform import

key_scheme.description: Key management scheme. Valid Values: NETWORK_WIFIKEY_SCHEME_WPAPSK, NETWORK_WIFIKEY_SCHEME_WPAEAPPSK

wifi_passwd.description: SENSITIVE: Wifi Password. This field will not be published by terraform import

block.description: SENSITIVE. List of wifi secrets (passwords). This field will not be published by terraform import command.

block.description: Schema for data source zedcloud_network_instance. Must specify id or name

accessmode.description: Access mode. Valid Values: VOLUME_INSTANCE_ACCESS_MODE_INVALID, VOLUME_INSTANCE_ACCESS_MODE_READWRITE, VOLUME_INSTANCE_ACCESS_MODE_READONLY, VOLUME_INSTANCE_ACCESS_MODE_MULTIREAD_SINGLEWRITE

cleartext.description: Flag to keep the contents of the volume unencrypted (in clear text)

device_id.description: ID of the device on which volume instance is created

id.description: System defined unique Id of the Object

multiattach.description: Flag to enable the volume to be attached to multiple app instances

name.description: User defined name of the object. Must be unique across the enterprise. Once object is created, name can’t be changed

project_id.description: ID of the project to which the Object belongs

revision.description: System defined revision information of the object

title.description: User defined title of the object. title can be changed any time.

type.description: Type of Volume Instance. Valid Values: VOLUME_INSTANCE_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED, VOLUME_INSTANCE_TYPE_EMPTYDIR, VOLUME_INSTANCE_TYPE_BLOCKSTORAGE, VOLUME_INSTANCE_TYPE_HOSTFS, VOLUME_INSTANCE_TYPE_TMPFS, VOLUME_INSTANCE_TYPE_SECRET, VOLUME_INSTANCE_TYPE_NFS, VOLUME_INSTANCE_TYPE_AWS_BLOCK_STORAGE, VOLUME_INSTANCE_TYPE_CONTENT_TREE

block.description: Schema for data source zedcloud_volume_instance. Must specify id or name
